text: Michael T. "Mykelti" Williamson (born March 4, 1957) is an American actor. He is best known for his roles in the movies Forrest Gump, Con Air and Ali.Mykelti Williamson profile, filmreference.com; accessed January 6, 2018. He also starred on the television shows Boomtown, 24, and Justified. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Mykelti Williamson
